Tables Demonstration

1. Simple Table with Borders

+----------+----------+
| Header 1 | Header 2 |
+----------+----------+
| Cell 1-1 | Cell 1-2 |
+----------+----------+
| Cell 2-1 | Cell 2-2 |
+----------+----------+

2. Borderless Table

A clean table without any borders:

+----------+-------+
| Name     | Value |
+----------+-------+
| Item One | 100   |
+----------+-------+
| Item Two | 200   |
+----------+-------+

3. Single-Side Border Tables

Top Border Only

+----------+----------+----------+
| Column 1 | Column 2 | Column 3 |
+----------+----------+----------+
| Data 1   | Data 2   | Data 3   |
+----------+----------+----------+

Bottom Border Only

+-----------+-----------+
| Header 1  | Header 2  |
+-----------+-----------+
| Content A | Content B |
+-----------+-----------+

Left Border Only

+------------------+-------------+
| Important Item 1 | Description |
+------------------+-------------+
| Important Item 2 | Description |
+------------------+-------------+

Right Border Only

+---------------+---------------+
| Label         | Value         |
+---------------+---------------+
| Another Label | Another Value |
+---------------+---------------+

4. Tables with Merged Cells

Horizontal Cell Merge (columnSpan)

+---------------------------------+--------+--------+
| Merged Header (spans 3 columns) |        |        |
+---------------------------------+--------+--------+
| Cell 1                          | Cell 2 | Cell 3 |
+---------------------------------+--------+--------+
| Merged (2 columns)              | Cell 3 |        |
+---------------------------------+--------+--------+

Vertical Cell Merge (rowSpan)

+--------------------------+--------------+--------------+
| Merged Vertical (2 rows) | Row 1, Col 2 | Row 1, Col 3 |
+--------------------------+--------------+--------------+
|                          | Row 2, Col 2 | Row 2, Col 3 |
+--------------------------+--------------+--------------+
| Row 3, Col 1             | Row 3, Col 2 | Row 3, Col 3 |
+--------------------------+--------------+--------------+

Complex Merged Table

+-------------------+------------------+--------+------+
| Full Width Header |                  |        |      |
+-------------------+------------------+--------+------+
| Vertical Merge    | Horizontal Merge | Normal |      |
+-------------------+------------------+--------+------+
|                   | Cell             | Cell   | Cell |
+-------------------+------------------+--------+------+
